locations: Coventry, West Midlands, England, UK::(exterior scenes)
imdb.plot outline: The charming children's entertainment figure Little Grey Fergie is coming home to Britain! Based on the legendary TE20 Massey Ferguson tractor, Fergie has been a hit in Norway for nearly twenty years, entertaining scores of Norwegian children. The time has come for Fergie to return to his British roots, and he has already had his first seven adventures on his English farm in Coventry.
imdb.title: One Week with Little Grey Fergie: The Web Series
akas: One Week with Little Grey Fergie: The Web Series (Norway)
